title: Room Scoring
uploadDescription: Upload a room photo, and our AI-powered professional designer will provide in-depth analysis from functionality, aesthetics, and lighting perspectives.
photoHint: Only JPG, PNG supported. Ensure good lighting.
networkError: Network error, please try again later
